item.title: First post
item.description: @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat:400,700); @import url(//netdna.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/3.2.1/css/font-awesome.css); body { background:#e2e2e2; width:98%; height:100vh; .card { width:800px; height:400px; background:transparent; position:absolute; left:0; right:0; margin:auto; top:0; bottom:0; border-radius:10px; -webkit-border-radius:10px; -moz-border-radius:10px; box-shadow: 0px 20px 30px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.55); &_left { width:40%; height:400px; float:left; overflow:hidden; background:transparent; img { width:100%; height:auto; border-radius:10px 0 0 10px; -webkit-border-radius:10px 0 0 10px; -moz-border-radius:10px 0 0 10px; position:relative; } } &_right { width:60%; float:left; background:#000000; height:400px; border-radius:0 10px 10px 0; -webkit-border-radius:0 10px
